links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..14
prog: (PARI) { for (n=1, 14, write("b060001.txt", n, " ", fibonacci(n)!); ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 01 2009(Sage) [factorial(fibonacci(n)) for n in xrange(0, 15)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Nov 29 2009
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Mar 14 2001
